p: The second goal was to introduce and spread knowledge about giant viruses to high school and undergraduate students. Our group has been dedicated to the exploration of giant viruses and isolates from different samples, including water, soil, sewage, and clinical samples, as well as in extreme environments, for example, permafrost and soda lakes [ 12, 17, 29, 30]. Giant viruses led biologists to rethink the nature of life. In recent years, giant viruses have been widely publicized in magazines, newspapers, blogs, television channels, and video sharing platforms; this coverage is an important example of scientific dissemination.
